title: How Game Pass Could Be Used To Give Failed Games Like Evolve A Second Chance | The Escapist Show
description:
Join our YouTube Membership program for Early Access to videos, badges, emojis, bonus content and more. ►► https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqg5FCR7NrpvlBWMXdt-5Vg/join

This week on The Escapist Show, Nick and Jack discuss how a subscription service like Xbox Game Pass could breathe life into games that failed to find an audience on their initial release.

Timestamps
The games we've been playing 0:00 - 10:20
Game Pass and reviving failed games 10:25 - 22:30
